graph.dag

Class TopologicalSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.dag.TopologicalSort

  • public class TopologicalSort
extends java.lang.Object
    Topologically sorts the vertices in a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG).
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> run(java.lang.Double[][] graph)
        Run the topological sort
        Parameters:
        graph - the adjacency matrix representing the DAG. Non-edges are represented by the null reference
        Returns:
        a sorted list of vertices

      • runIteration

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> runIteration(java.lang.Double[][] graph,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> toProcess)
        Run a single iteration of the topological sort
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph
        toProcess - a list of vertices that have yet to be added to the list of sorted vertices
        Returns:
        a list of vertices from the list of unsorted vertices that must be appended to the list of sorted vertices

      • cutVertex

        private static void cutVertex(java.lang.Double[][] graph,
             java.lang.Integer vertex)
        Cut a vertex from the graph. That is, cut all outgoing edges from this vertex.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph
        vertex - the vertex to cut from the graph

      • getAllVertices

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getAllVertices(java.lang.Double[][] graph)
        Get all vertices in a graph
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph
        Returns:
        all vertices in the graph
